title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, December 9, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Grace Hopper (1906-1992), who helped invent the modern computer and who helped design and promote a new computer language called COBOL.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Grace Hopper (1906-1992), who helped invent the modern computer and who helped design and promote a new computer language called COBOL.
